SELECT a.session_id AS sessionId, SUBSTRING(b.content, 1, 16) AS lastContent AS lastContent, b.create_time AS lastContentCreateTime, b.type AS lastContentType
FROM base_im_session_content_ref_user a
LEFT JOIN base_im_session_content b ON b.id = a.content_id
WHERE a.user_id = #{currentUserId}
AND a.show_flag = TRUE
AND b.enable_flag = TRUE
AND a.session_id IN
#{item}
ORDER BY b.create_ts DESC, b.order_no DESC

SELECT IF(c.name = '', c.target_name, c.name) AS showName, c.target_id AS targetId, c.target_type AS target_type, c.session_id AS sessionId, c.avatar_url AS avatarUrl, COUNT(*) AS searchCount
FROM base_im_session_content_ref_user a LEFT JOIN base_im_session_content b ON b.id = a.content_id LEFT JOIN base_im_session_ref_user c ON c.session_id = b.session_id
WHERE a.user_id = #{currentUserId}
AND a.show_flag = TRUE
AND b.enable_flag = TRUE
AND b.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.content}, '%')
GROUP BY c.session_id
ORDER BY b.create_ts DESC, b.order_no DESC
